remark.ch: 資訊電機學院大學部四年級可選修。

goal.en: Students will understand microwave circuit through Lab.
goal.ch: 藉由實作，讓學生更進一步了解微波電路。

content.en:
課程概述：分析、設計、製作與量測微波電路。
課程目標：藉由實作，讓學生更進一步了解微波電路。
◎Microstrip Ring Resonator
-Discussions on Ethics for Engineers.
-Effective dielectric constant
-Dielectric constant measurement
◎Microstrip Line and Quarter-Wavelength Impedance Transformer
-Microstrip line
-Via hole
-Impedance transformer
◎Stepped-Impedance Low-pass Filter
-Transmission line equivalent inductance and capacitance
-Stepped-impedance LPF
◎Wilkinson Power Divider
-Even- and odd-mode analysis
-Power divider
◎Branch-Line Coupler
-90-degree coupler
◎CPW-to-Slotline Transition
-CPW and slotline
-CPW-slotline transition
◎Coupled-Line Bandpass Filter
-Coupled-line BPF
◎Microstrip Antenna
-Microstrip patch antenna
◎Microstrip Ring Resonator
-Discussions on Ethics for Engineers.
-Effective dielectric constant
-Dielectric constant measurement
◎Microstrip Line and Quarter-Wavelength Impedance Transformer
-Microstrip line
-Via hole
-Impedance transformer
◎Stepped-Impedance Low-pass Filter
-Transmission line equivalent inductance and capacitance
-Stepped-impedance LPF
◎Wilkinson Power Divider
-Even- and odd-mode analysis
-Power divider
◎Branch-Line Coupler
-90-degree coupler
◎CPW-to-Slotline Transition
-CPW and slotline
-CPW-slotline transition
◎Coupled-Line Bandpass Filter
-Coupled-line BPF
◎Microstrip Antenna
-Microstrip patch antenna
◎Project
-Project

en: Department:MSc in Electrical Engineering、PhD in Electrical Engineering only.

Department:Department of Electrical Engineering、Department of Communication Engineering、Interdisciplinary Program of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science、Double Major-Department of Electrical Engineering only.Year:Fourth Year only.
ch: 系所:限電機工程學系碩士班、電機工程學系博士班。
系所:限電機工程學系、通訊工程學系、資訊電機學院學士班、雙主修-電機工程學系。年級:限四年級。
